name: Exit The Mirror
description:
Exit The Mirror is a 2D platformer game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1.

In this game, you have to explore 10 tiny levels, but there's a catch ! At the end of these levels, you will find a mirror that leads you to the same level, but reversed ! So you have to do the same level again with your controls inversed...

Controls : 

A / D : Move

Space : Jump
